title: Bhugra et al. report high rates of attempted suicide in Asian women, especially at young ages, and go on to investigate the precipitating factors (Bhugra et al. 29, 1125–1130 and 1133–1139).
abstract: Bhugra et al. report high rates of attempted suicide in Asian women, especially at young ages, and go on to investigate the precipitating factors (Bhugra et al. 29, 1125–1130 and 1133–1139). - Volume 30 Issue 4
